hooks.command: cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks pre-command --command "{}" --validate-safety true --prepare-resources true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks pre-edit --file "{}" --auto-assign-agents true --load-context true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.command // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks post-command --command "{}" --track-metrics true --store-results true
cat | jq -r '.tool_input.file_path // .tool_input.path // ""' | xargs -I {} pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks post-edit --file "{}" --format true --update-memory true --train-neural true

/usr/bin/env bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); KEY=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.key // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); VALUE=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.value // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); NS=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.namespace // \"default\"" 2>/dev/null); ACTION=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.action // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); if [ "$ACTION" = "store" ] && [ -n "$KEY" ]; then ./.claude/hooks/memory-to-learnings-bridge.sh "$KEY" "$VALUE" "$NS" 2>/dev/null & fi'

/usr/bin/env bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); ACTION=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.action // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); if [ "$ACTION" = "learn" ]; then OP=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.operation // \"neural-pattern\"" 2>/dev/null); OUTCOME=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.outcome // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); ./.claude/hooks/log-learning.sh "Neural Pattern: $OP" "$OUTCOME" "neural" "Learned from neural_patterns MCP" 2>/dev/null & fi'

/usr/bin/env bash -c 'INPUT=$(cat); BUCKET=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.bucket // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); PATH=$(echo "$INPUT" | jq -r ".tool_input.path // \"\"" 2>/dev/null); echo "[3-Layer Sync] flow-nexus storage: $BUCKET/$PATH" >> /tmp/memory-chain.log'

/usr/bin/env bash -c 'if command -v pnpm >/dev/null 2>&1; then pnpm dlx agentic-flow hooks session-end --generate-summary true --persist-state true --export-metrics true; else echo "⚠️  pnpm not available, skipping Agentic Flow session-end hook"; fi'
/usr/bin/env bash -c 'if [ -f ./.claude/helpers/standard-checkpoint-hooks.sh ]; then ./.claude/helpers/standard-checkpoint-hooks.sh session-end; else echo "⚠️  Checkpoint hooks not found"; fi'
